sql.statement: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS employee ( _id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, firstName VARCHAR(50), lastName VARCHAR(50), title VARCHAR(50), department VARCHAR(50), managerId INTEGER, city VARCHAR(50), officePhone VARCHAR(30), cellPhone VARCHAR(30), email VARCHAR(30), picture VARCHAR(200), indexNumber VARCHAR(5))
